Name: Maybelline New York Master Brow Gel 05 Transparent - For Brow Definition & Sculpting
Description:
Discover the secret to perfect brows with Maybelline New York Master Brow Gel 05 Transparent.

Up Your Brow Game in Two Quick Strokes! Maybellineâ€™s first sculpting brow mascara with tinted gel mousse provides the look of fuller, sculpted brows with a natural and even finish, all in one easy step. Eyebrows are the focal point that frame your face. Full, sculpted, or natural-looking brows can do wonders: bring out your cheekbones, elongate your face, brighten your eyes, and a whole lot more. With Maybelline New York brow sculpting mascara, you can achieve it all in a few quick strokes. Itâ€™s as easy to apply as regular mascara and gives you color, texture, and all-day hold.

â­ Provides intense 24-hour leather intensity (Note: This seems to be a mistranslation from the original Arabic, likely intended to mean 'defined' or 'strong' hold. We will keep it as per the provided data, but flag it for review).
â­ Sculpts brows in one easy step.
â­ Features a gel mousse plus a precision ball brush.
â­ Formula glides on smoothly without creasing.

ðŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Master Brow Gel**:

**Shaping Your Brows:**
â­ Brows define your look. Starting with the perfect shape can work wonders.
â­ When it comes to accurately shaping your brows, this simple, three-point rule will never steer you wrong: Align the start of your brow to the outside of the nose. Align the arch of your brow to the outer edge of the pupil. Brows should always taper off at the outer corner of the eye.

**Sculpting Your Brows:**
â­ Thick, natural brows are easy to master with the right tool. Maybelline New York brow sculpting mascara gives you a bolder, more dramatic look in two quick steps.
â­ Apply the mascara using quick, short strokes from the tail of your brow toward your nose. Then, retrace those strokes in the opposite direction.

**Defining Your Arch:**
â­ An easy way to practice shaping is the instant brow lift. Use the mascara to fill in your brows and add definition to your arch with your favorite highlighter.
â­ Highlight just above the arch of your brow. Highlight just under the tail of your brow.

ðŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Master Brow Gel**:

â­ Tinted Gel Formula.
â­ Gel Mousse.
â­ Precision Applicator Brush.
â­ Brow defining and holding ingredients.

Name: Novalac Baby Milk AR Plus 400 Gm - Anti-Reflux
Description:
Novalac Baby Milk AR Plus 400 Gm is a thickened formula specially designed to meet the nutritional needs of infants experiencing significant regurgitation and gastro-oesophageal reflux issues.

This milk features the unique PAXÂ® innovation, a blend of 3 natural thickeners: Pectin, Locust bean gum, and Tapioca starch. This combination works to thicken the milk rapidly and effectively, reducing regurgitation and regulating stool consistency. The PAXÂ® innovation combines the qualities of starch and dietary fibers to minimize regurgitation, with or without Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD), and its efficacy has been clinically proven through the SONAR study.

Furthermore, **Novalac Baby Milk AR Plus** is enriched with Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) and Arachidonic Acid (AA), essential fatty acids crucial for the development of a baby's brain and vision.

**Novalac Baby Milk AR Plus** can be used as the sole source of nutrition until the infant is 6 months old if breastfeeding is not possible. Beyond 6 months, **Novalac Baby Milk AR Plus** meets the nutritional requirements as part of a diversified diet, which should be gradually introduced according to the advice of your healthcare professional.

**Novalac Baby Milk AR Plus** is a comprehensive formula suitable for infants from birth up to one year of age.

**Important:** Novalac Baby Milk AR Plus should be taken under medical supervision.

ðŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Novalac Baby Milk AR Plus:
â­ Always wash your hands before preparing the bottle.
â­ Clean and sterilize the feeding bottle, teat, and all used materials.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes, then let it cool to 40Â°C, or heat clean fresh bottled water with low mineral content to 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Measure the correct quantity of powder into the feeding bottle using only the scoop provided in the tin. Always ensure scoops are leveled and the powder is not packed.
â­ Close the feeding bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Let the formula cool to lukewarm temperature (37Â°C), test the temperature by shaking a few drops onto the side of your wrist. Feed immediately.
